description: [``botocore``] SDK and documentation updates for UpdateReplacePolicy
[``botocore``] Updated exsiting API to allow AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery support of launching recovery into existing EC2 instances.

[``botocore``] This launch expands our matching techniques to include provider-based matching to help customer match, link, and enhance records with minimal data movement. With data service providers, we have removed the need for customers to build bespoke integrations,.
[``botocore``] This release introduces two new APIs: GetAssetContract and ListAssetContracts. This release also adds support for Bitcoin Testnet.
[``botocore``] This release allows customers to manage MediaPackage v2 resource using CloudFormation.
[``botocore``] This release allows customers to list and associate optional plugin packages with compatible Amazon OpenSearch Service clusters for enhanced functionality.
[``botocore``] Added support for managing credentials of serverless namespace admin using AWS Secrets Manager.
[``botocore``] Added support for managing credentials of provisioned cluster admin using AWS Secrets Manager.

[``botocore``] This release provides enhanced visibility into your SES identity verification status. This will offer you more actionable insights, enabling you to promptly address any verification-related issues.
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for AWS Transfer Family
[``botocore``] This releases enhances GetTraceSummaries API to support new TimeRangeType Service to query trace summaries by segment end time.
